languages.text: "Вот и все. Но знаешь, что не дает мне покоя, Вольный Торговец? Этих несчастных здесь слишком мало. Нижние уровни подобных мануфакторумов населяют миллионы людей — что произошло с ними?" {n}Дознаватель качает головой.{/n} "Я знаю, что ответ мне не понравится. Идем же. Мы все еще не достигли нашей цели".

traits.locale_text: "Знаешь, что не дает мне покоя, Вольный Торговец? Их... слишком мало. Нижние уровни подобных заводов населяют миллионы людей... что произошло с ними?" {n}Дознаватель качает головой.{/n} "Я знаю, что ответ мне не понравится. Идем же. Мы все еще не достигли своей цели".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "That's that, then. But do you know what bothers me, Rogue Trader? The number of people here — there are too few. The lower levels of similar manufactorums are inhabited by millions — what happened to the rest of them?" {n}Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "I know I won't like the answer. Let's go. We still haven't done what we came here to do."
languages.original_text: "Вот и все. Но знаешь, что не дает мне покоя, Вольный Торговец? Этих несчастных здесь слишком мало. Нижние уровни подобных мануфакторумов населяют миллионы людей — что произошло с ними?" {n}Дознаватель качает головой.{/n} "Я знаю, что ответ мне не понравится. Идем же. Мы все еще не достигли нашей цели".

traits.locale_text: "That's that, then. But do you know what bothers me, Rogue Trader? The number of people here — there are too few. The lower levels of similar manufactorums are inhabited by millions — what happened to the rest of them?" {n}Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "I know I won't like the answer. Let's go. We still haven't done what we came here to do."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That's that, then. But do you know what bothers me, Rogue Trader? The number of people here — there are too few. The lower levels of similar manufactorums are inhabited by millions — what happened to the rest of them?" {n}Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "I know I won't like the answer. Let's go. We still haven't done what we came here to do."

traits.locale_text: "That's that, then. But do you know what bothers me, Rogue Trader? The number of people here — there are too few. The lower levels of similar manufactorums are inhabited by millions — what happened to the rest of them?" {n}Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "I know I won't like the answer. Let's go. We still haven't done what we came here to do."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That's that, then. But do you know what bothers me, Rogue Trader? The number of people here — there are too few. The lower levels of similar manufactorums are inhabited by millions — what happened to the rest of them?" {n}Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "I know I won't like the answer. Let's go. We still haven't done what we came here to do."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “看来就这样了。不过，你知道什么事情让我感到不安吗，行商浪人？这里的人实在是太少了，像这种制造工厂的底层，通常都应该住着几百万人才对。剩下的人怎么样了？”{n}海因里希摇了摇头。{/n}“我恐怕不会喜欢这个问题的答案。咱们走吧，该来这里办的事情还没办完呢。”
languages.original_text: "That's that, then. But do you know what bothers me, Rogue Trader? The number of people here — there are too few. The lower levels of similar manufactorums are inhabited by millions — what happened to the rest of them?" {n}Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "I know I won't like the answer. Let's go. We still haven't done what we came here to do."

traits.locale_text: “看来就这样了。不过，你知道什么事情让我感到不安吗，行商浪人？这里的人实在是太少了，像这种制造工厂的底层，通常都应该住着几百万人才对。剩下的人怎么样了？”{n}海因里希摇了摇头。{/n}“我恐怕不会喜欢这个问题的答案。咱们走吧，该来这里办的事情还没办完呢。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Pues se acabó. Comerciante Independiente, ¿sabe qué es lo que más me preocupa de todo esto? Aquí hay demasiado poca gente. En los niveles inferiores de otros manufactorums similares hay millones de personas. ¿Dónde están los demás?». {n}Heinrix niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Sé que la respuesta no me va a gustar nada. En marcha; todavía no hemos hecho lo que veníamos a hacer».
languages.original_text: "That's that, then. But do you know what bothers me, Rogue Trader? The number of people here — there are too few. The lower levels of similar manufactorums are inhabited by millions — what happened to the rest of them?" {n}Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "I know I won't like the answer. Let's go. We still haven't done what we came here to do."

traits.locale_text: «Pues se acabó. Comerciante Independiente, ¿sabe qué es lo que más me preocupa de todo esto? Aquí hay demasiado poca gente. En los niveles inferiores de otros manufactorums similares hay millones de personas. ¿Dónde están los demás?». {n}Heinrix niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Sé que la respuesta no me va a gustar nada. En marcha; todavía no hemos hecho lo que veníamos a hacer».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「それはそうだ。だが、自由開拓者、我が何を気にしているのかわかりますか？ここにいる人間の数が…少なすぎるということです。同じような聖工場の下層には何百万人も住んでいます…ここにいない残りの人間には何があったのでしょう？」{n}ハインリックスは首を振る。{/n}「答えが気に入らないのは分かっています。行きましょう。ここに来た目的はまだ果たせていません」
languages.original_text: "That's that, then. But do you know what bothers me, Rogue Trader? The number of people here — there are too few. The lower levels of similar manufactorums are inhabited by millions — what happened to the rest of them?" {n}Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "I know I won't like the answer. Let's go. We still haven't done what we came here to do."

traits.locale_text: 「それはそうだ。だが、自由開拓者、我が何を気にしているのかわかりますか？ここにいる人間の数が…少なすぎるということです。同じような聖工場の下層には何百万人も住んでいます…ここにいない残りの人間には何があったのでしょう？」{n}ハインリックスは首を振る。{/n}「答えが気に入らないのは分かっています。行きましょう。ここに来た目的はまだ果たせていません」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "So viel dazu. Aber wisst Ihr, was mich beunruhigt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Die Anzahl der Personen hier – es sind zu wenige. In den unteren Ebenen ähnlicher Manufactorien leben Millionen – was ist mit dem Rest passiert?" {n}Heinrix schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Ich weiß, die Antwort wird mir nicht gefallen. Gehen wir. Wir haben noch nicht erledigt, weswegen wir hier sind."
languages.original_text: "That's that, then. But do you know what bothers me, Rogue Trader? The number of people here — there are too few. The lower levels of similar manufactorums are inhabited by millions — what happened to the rest of them?" {n}Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "I know I won't like the answer. Let's go. We still haven't done what we came here to do."

traits.locale_text: "So viel dazu. Aber wisst Ihr, was mich beunruhigt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Die Anzahl der Personen hier – es sind zu wenige. In den unteren Ebenen ähnlicher Manufactorien leben Millionen – was ist mit dem Rest passiert?" {n}Heinrix schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Ich weiß, die Antwort wird mir nicht gefallen. Gehen wir. Wir haben noch nicht erledigt, weswegen wir hier sind."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Bien, nous n'en tirerons rien de plus. Mais savez-vous ce qui me laisse perplexe, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? Ces prisonniers devraient être beaucoup plus nombreux. Dans d'autres manufactorums de ce genre, les niveaux inférieurs sont peuplés de millions de gens. Qu'est-il arrivé aux autres ? » {n}Heinrix secoue la tête.{/n} « Je sais déjà que la réponse ne me plaira pas. Allons-y. Nous n'avons pas encore accompli notre objectif ici. »
languages.original_text: "That's that, then. But do you know what bothers me, Rogue Trader? The number of people here — there are too few. The lower levels of similar manufactorums are inhabited by millions — what happened to the rest of them?" {n}Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "I know I won't like the answer. Let's go. We still haven't done what we came here to do."

traits.locale_text: « Bien, nous n'en tirerons rien de plus. Mais savez-vous ce qui me laisse perplexe, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? Ces prisonniers devraient être beaucoup plus nombreux. Dans d'autres manufactorums de ce genre, les niveaux inférieurs sont peuplés de millions de gens. Qu'est-il arrivé aux autres ? » {n}Heinrix secoue la tête.{/n} « Je sais déjà que la réponse ne me plaira pas. Allons-y. Nous n'avons pas encore accompli notre objectif ici. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Pekâlâ. Beni rahatsız eden nedir, biliyor musun Hür Tacir? Buradaki insanların sayısı. Çok az insan var. Benzer manufaktorumların alt seviyelerinde milyonlarca insan yaşıyor. Buradakilere ne oldu?" {n}Heinrix, başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "Sorumun hoş bir cevabı olmayacağı belli. Gidelim. Henüz buraya geliş amacımıza ulaşamadık."
languages.original_text: "That's that, then. But do you know what bothers me, Rogue Trader? The number of people here — there are too few. The lower levels of similar manufactorums are inhabited by millions — what happened to the rest of them?" {n}Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "I know I won't like the answer. Let's go. We still haven't done what we came here to do."

traits.locale_text: “Pekâlâ. Beni rahatsız eden nedir, biliyor musun Hür Tacir? Buradaki insanların sayısı. Çok az insan var. Benzer manufaktorumların alt seviyelerinde milyonlarca insan yaşıyor. Buradakilere ne oldu?” {n}Heinrix, başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} “Sorumun hoş bir cevabı olmayacağı belli. Gidelim. Henüz buraya geliş amacımıza ulaşamadık.”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
